trait.name: Features
entries: {@optfeature Archery|phb}, {@classFeature Extra Attack|ranger|phb|5}, {@classFeature Favored Enemy|ranger|phb|1} ({@filter undead|bestiary|flsttype=undead} & {@filter construct|bestiary|flsttype=construct}), {@subclassFeature Horde Breaker|ranger|phb|hunter|phb|3}, {@subclassFeature Escape the Horde|ranger|phb|hunter|phb|7}

action.name: {@item Longbow|phb}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage. {@subclassFeature Horde Breaker|ranger|phb|hunter|phb|3} & {@classFeature Extra Attack|ranger|phb|5}

action.name: {@item Net|phb}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 5/15 ft., one target. {@dc 10} Strength; else {@condition restrained}.

action.name: {@item Handaxe|phb}
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3}/{@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage in melee, or 4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage at range.
